content.text:
Oof, sorry about that! The [scuttlebot tests](https://github.com/ssbc/scuttlebot/blob/f11eacb2457ed757f2b267720f56e33fd206c42f/test/master.js#L16-L40) give me the impression that it should work without any `setImmediate` workarounds, so I'm curious where the issue is popping up. Is there some minimal test code you could post to reproduce the issue? Alternatively, it might be helpful to run `npm test` in the Scuttlebot repository to verify that all of that code works on your machine, as it *should* be fine as-is.

Sorry for streamrolling with a solution to a different problem!
